CustomField.description: To show a confirmation message popup when a question is responded, enter the confirmation message here. If the message is not specified (i.e. empty), the confirmation message will not be displayed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To show a confirmation message popup when a question is responded, enter the confirmation message here. If the message is not specified (i.e. empty), the confirmation message will not be displayed.
CustomField.label: Confirmation Message
